articles.author: Daniel Rees
articles.title: Sara Trost from Southend shot dead in America | Echo - Echo
articles.description: An estate agent from Southend was shot dead in a vehicle in the US, two days before Christmas.
articles.content:
A British estate agent was shot dead in a vehicle in the US, two days before Christmas.
Sara Trost, 40, of Parkland, Florida, was found by officers in the drivers seat suffering from multiple gunsho… [+1001 chars]

articles.title: Eyimofe makes Guardian UK's best films from Africa, Asia, Latin America list - Guardian Nigeria
articles.description: Eyimofe has been picked along with nine others on a shortlist of top films from Africa, Asia and Latin America by The Guardian of the UK.
articles.content:
Eyimofe (This Is My Desire), directed by twin brothers Arie Esiri and Chuko Esiri. Photograph: Everett Collection Inc/Alamy

articles.author: Dennis Romero, Kurt Chirbas
articles.title: Holland America cruise skips Mexico stop after positive Covid-19 tests - NBC News
articles.description: A Holland America cruise ship was on its way back to port Saturday after it was rejected by Mexican health officials following positive Covid-19 tests on board.
articles.content: SAN DIEGO A Holland America Line cruise ship was on its way back to port Saturday after Mexican health officials would not allow guests to disembark in Puerto Vallarta following positive Covid-19 tes… [+2132 chars]
